title: Advisory: President Barack Obama to Hold News Conference Wednesday, April 29 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 24, 2009

 



Advisory: President Barack Obama to Hold News Conference Wednesday, April 29




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ________________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                                  April 24, 2009    PRESIDENT BARACK OBAMA TO HOLD NEWS CONFERENCE WEDNESDAY, APRIL 29 **Credentialing information included below**   On Wednesday, April 29th, President Barack Obama will convene a nationally-televised news conference at 8:00PM EDT at the White House.  Due to limited space, members of the media interested in attending must apply for credentials by following the instructions below. All members of the media interested in attending, including current White House hard pass holders, MUST APPLY FOR CREDENTIALS.   To request a credential, media members must apply HERE. The deadline to apply is 12:00PM EDT on Monday, April 27th.   Members who do not currently hold a White House hard pass MUST also email the following information to press@who.eop.gov: Full name  Date of birth  Social security number  Country of citizenship   NOTE: All riser positions have already been allocated. A pool feed will be available.   Applicants will be notified by 6:00PM EDT on Tuesday, April 28th if credentials have been granted and will then be provided with logistical information.
